<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">
[Noxious Vapors](/Spells.aspx?ID=2011)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=645" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=669" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 248 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 10-foot emanation

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Defense**
[basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=2297) Fortitude

**Duration** 1 round
</row>

</column>

---

You emit a cloud of toxic smoke that temporarily obscures you from sight. Each creature except you in the area when you Cast the Spell takes 1d6 poison damage ([basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save). A creature that critically fails the saving throw also becomes [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=91). All creatures in the area become [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=62), and all creatures outside the smoke become concealed to creatures within it. This smoke can be dispersed by a strong wind.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 1d6.
name: Noxious Vapors
